import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { classNames } from 'primereact/utils'; function Device() { return (

Device

setSelectedProducts(e.value)} dataKey="id" paginator rows={10} rowsPerPageOptions={[5, 10, 25]} paginatorTemplate="FirstPageLink PrevPageLink PageLinks NextPageLink LastPageLink CurrentPageReport RowsPerPageDropdown" currentPageReportTemplate="Showing {first} to {last} of {totalRecords} products" globalFilter={globalFilter} header={header}>
) } export default Device
